Currently, a [Vector] is just a table containing 3 variables, x, y, and z.

Vector functions include:

 * vAdd([Vector],[Vector]) -returns the sum of the 2 [Vector]s.
 * vSub([Vector],[Vector]) -returns the difference of the 2 [Vector]s.
 * vMul([Vector],[Vector]) -returns the product or the 2 [Vector]s.
 * Vector(x(number),y(number),z(number)) -use this to create a new vector.
 * VectorNormalize([Vector]) -returns a normalized [Vector].
 * VectorLength([Vector]) -returns the length of a [Vector] as a number.
 * VectorForward([Vector]) -given an angle(pitch,yaw,roll), this returns the Forward normal as a [Vector].
 * VectorRight([Vector]) -given an angle(pitch,yaw,roll), this returns the Right normal as a [Vector].
 * VectorUp([Vector]) -given an angle(pitch,yaw,roll), this returns the Up normal as a [Vector].
